page.title: 13WICTON FARM
page.content: Total area ..........120 acres Arable................25 acres Grassland.............87 acres Woodland...............8 acres Crops....barley, hay, silage. Uses for silage......cow food Uses for hay....young stock food Farm Machinery...1 land-rover, 4 cars, 3 tractors. Equipment for...hay-making, drilling, fertilising, ploughing, muck-spreading. Animals...88 milking-cows, 23 calves, 20 laying-hens, 6 other poultry, 15 yearlings. Eggs a week...56 Buildings...2 barns, 1 milking parlour, 3 cattle sheds, 6 hen-houses, 1 farm-house, 1 cottage. People....5 live on farm, 1 works on farm, 1 employed on farm.
